Frequently Asked Questions

Get answers to common questions about our pricing

Can I change my plan at any time?

Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and you'll be charged or credited on a prorated basis.

Do you offer refunds?

We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for all paid plans. If you're not satisfied, contact our support team for a full refund.

What payment methods do you accept?

We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers for Enterprise customers.

Is there a free trial available?

Yes! All paid plans come with a 14-day free trial. No credit card required to start your trial.

How does team collaboration work?

Business and Enterprise plans include team features like shared workspaces, design libraries, commenting, and permission management.

Can I use my designs commercially?

Yes, all plans include commercial usage rights. You own the designs you create and can use them for any commercial purpose.

Ready to Start Creating Amazing Tags?

Join thousands of designers and businesses who trust TagCraft Studio. Start your free trial today - no credit card required.
